news.title: Trump criticises 'decaying' European countries and 'weak' leaders
news.summary: The US president says European countries have failed to control migration or take decisive action to end Ukraine's war with Russia.

news.title: Storm Bram brings flooding and travel disruption to UK
news.summary: Amber and yellow warnings for wind are in place, with gusts of 90mph forecast in north-west Scotland.

news.title: MI5 closely involved in handling of IRA spy Stakeknife, says report
news.summary: The final report of Operation Kenova says the security service had "greater knowledge" of Stakeknife than it had first stated.

news.title: Member of UK armed forces dies in accident in Ukraine
news.summary: He died in an accident away from Ukraine's front lines on Tuesday, the Ministry of Defence says.

news.title: Some schools disrupted and Covid-like measures brought in amid rise in flu cases
news.summary: Flu is on the rise, but ministers say schools should only close in extreme circumstances.

news.title: TV faithful Claudia Winkleman made MBE by King at Windsor Castle
news.summary: The Traitors and Strictly presenter was recognised on Tuesday for services to broadcasting.

news.title: Much of Â£11bn Covid scheme fraud 'beyond recovery', report finds
news.summary: The response to the pandemic led to "enormous outlays of public money which exposed it to the risk of fraud and error", a report says.

news.title: Grooming gangs inquiry to be led by former children's commissioner Anne Longfield
news.summary: Baroness Anne Longfield will chair the three-year inquiry which has been beset by problems.

news.title: Lithuania declares emergency situation over Belarus balloons
news.summary: Prime Minister Inga Ruginiene says the "hybrid attack" poses a real risk to national security and civil aviation.

news.title: Nigel Farage meets French far-right leader in London
news.summary: National Rally president Jordan Bardella says he believes the Reform UK leader will become the next British PM.
